backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping Valentine app requirements to involved files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files and their roles in the Valentine experience.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining a romantic color theme and global variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML mounting point that loads the React Valentine app.
frontend/public/valentine.html: Standalone HTML/CSS/JS page implementing the Valentine prompt, evasive No button, and celebration view.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component with evasive No button logic and the Yes-triggered celebration view showing image and text.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance based on Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes plus basic body styles and custom animation delay utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, and loads global CSS.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors from CSS variables, extended theme settings, animations, and additional plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, image requirements, and architectural notes for the Valentine proposal app.
